overview: The movie ‘Kanakam Moolam’ starring Harris Mannancherry and Nina Kurup has been released through Roots video. The investigative thriller ‘Kanakam Moolam’ is about a man who tries to pawn a stolen necklace on the pretext that it is gold, and then the police bring him to court and bring out the story of a big scam in the police investigation.  Directed by Advocate Saneesh Kunjukunju and Abhilash Ramachandran, the film stars newcomers Sunil Kalathoor, Jagadish Thevalapparambu, Binoy Paul and K.S. Jayakrishnan, Pradeep K. The. Puram, Mohammad Sali, Nireesh Gopalakrishnan, Aishwarya Anil and Surya Surendran.  Cinematography: Libas Mohammad, Editing: Amal Raju, Abhijith Udayakumar. The film is produced by Baby Mol under the banner of Thirumathil Films Pvt. Ltd. and can be seen in the Roots video. News propaganda- a. The. Dinesh.
title: Kanakam Moolam
